info.title: Traceability Vocabulary Specification
info.description:
Traceability Schemas in OpenAPI format for use with swagger, redoc and similar

Demonstrates how to utilize the schemas over OpenAPI as there is not a direct 1:1 translation between OpenAPI and JSON Schema

AccessCertificate.title: AccessCertificate
AccessCertificate.description: EVGI: Access Certificate act as the main key to entry for accessing

UIUD.title: UIUD
UIUD.description: A unique ID generated through the hash of the rest of the informaiton in certiciate

URI.title: URI
URI.description: URI of the information the AC grants access to

IssuerEID.title: IssuerEID
IssuerEID.description: The EID of the entity issuing the AC

Expiration.title: Expiration
Expiration.description: Timestamp that this certificate expires on

SignAlgo.title: Signature Algorithm
SignAlgo.description: cryptographic scheme used to sign the certificate

UIUD.title: UIUD
UIUD.description: Unqiue Block List ID generated through the hash of informaiton in the block list informaiton

URI.title: URI
URI.description: URI of the information the entity is being block-listed for

IssuerEID.title: IssuerEID
IssuerEID.description: The EID of the owner fo this data

BREID.title: BREID
BREID.description: Block List target's EID, or the EID that is barred from accessing URI

SignAlgo.title: Signature Algorithm
SignAlgo.description: cryptographic scheme used to sign the certificate

Reason.title: Reason
Reason.description: Reason why the AC was invoked

TransactionNumber.title: Transaction Number
TransactionNumber.description: Transaction Number, specific to credit system

TransactionType.title: Transaction Type
TransactionType.description: Transaction Type, specific to credit system

address.title: Postal Address
address.description: The postal address for an organization or place.

Customer.title: Customer
Customer.description: Customer record based on Customer from schema.org

DataHost.title: Data Host
DataHost.description: EVGI: Data Host that ingest and expose data

Endpoint.title: Endpoint
Endpoint.description: The root URI that this entity distributes data from

HostType.title: Host Type
HostType.description: They types of data that this entity distributes

UIUD.title: UIUD
UIUD.description: A unique ID generated through the hash of the rest of the informaiton in certiciate

WebURI.title: WebURI
WebURI.description: WebURI to tie to a receiverEID

DataStructure.title: DataStructure
DataStructure.description: A string specifying the structure of the data.

CommitFrequencyT.title: CommitFrequencyT
CommitFrequencyT.description: Frequency of commitment to chain in time in milliseconds

ReceiverEID.title: ReceiverEID
ReceiverEID.description: The EID of the data host receiving these permissions

OwnerEID.title: OwnerEID
OwnerEID.description: The EID of the owner fo this data

SignAlgo.title: Signature Algorithm
SignAlgo.description: cryptographic scheme used to sign the certificate

DriverLicense.title: DriverLicense
DriverLicense.description: Driver License user use to register

EC.title: EC
EC.description: EVGI: Common structure that wraps EID. ECs are extensible for addtional fileds

PubKey.title: PubKey
PubKey.description: Publick key used to communicate with this EID

RevURI.title: Revocation URI
RevURI.description: Revocation URI used for keeping track of all revocation certificate

ALURI.title: Allow List URI
ALURI.description: Allow List URI used for keeping track of all Allow List certificate

BLURI.title: BLocked List URI
BLURI.description: Blocked List URI used for keeping track of all Blcoked List certificate

SignAlgo.title: Signature Algorithm
SignAlgo.description: cryptographic scheme used to sign the certificate

HashAlgo.title: Hash Algorithm
HashAlgo.description: cryptographic scheme used to hash the certificate

IssuerSig.title: Issuer Signature
IssuerSig.description: Signature on the hash of rest of the certificate

EVGIEntityExtension.title: EVGI Entity Extension
EVGIEntityExtension.description: EVGI: EVGI Entity Extension includes metadata about payment parameters

Address.title: Address
Address.description: The address on this entity on given platform/ledger

URI.title: URI
URI.description: URI of the information the entity is being block-listed for

IssuerEID.title: IssuerEID
IssuerEID.description: The EID of the owner fo this data

BREID.title: BREID
BREID.description: Block List target's EID, or the EID that is barred from accessing URI

SignAlgo.title: Signature Algorithm
SignAlgo.description: cryptographic scheme used to sign the certificate

Reason.title: Reason
Reason.description: Reason why the AC was invoked

totalFuelConsumed.title: totalFuelConsumed
totalFuelConsumed.description: total Fuel Consumed by the vehicle in kg

EntityCertificate.title: EntityCertificate
EntityCertificate.description: Entity Certificate as defined in VID I

publicKey.title: The public key of the entity

signature.title: Signature
signature.description: The signature for the certificate associated with the public key

validityPeriod.title: validityPeriod
validityPeriod.description: period during which the entity certificate is valid

Event.title: Organization
Event.description: An event such as a transformation, aggregation, commission, etc.

place.title: Event Location
place.description: The location where the event took place.

eventTime.title: Event Time
eventTime.description: The time when the event took place.

products.title: Products
products.description: The products referenced by the event.

GeoCoordinates.title: Geographic Coordinates
GeoCoordinates.description: The geographic coordinates of a place or event.

latitude.title: Latitude
latitude.description: Angular distance North or South from the earth's equator measured through 90 degrees. Latitude of location based on ISO 6709

longitude.title: Longitude
longitude.description: The arc or portion of the earth's equator intersected between the meridian of a given place and the prime meridian and expressed in degrees. Longitude of location based on ISO 6709

timestamp.title: timestamp
timestamp.description: Date and Time based on IETF RFC 3339.

locationDescription.title: locationDescription
locationDescription.description:
Description of location such as "Free Standing Residential Home" 
or may be a URI that points to a more detailed description such as an address registry. Date and Time based on IETF RFC 3339.

URI.title: URI
URI.description: URL of the information that should be modified

OwnerEID.title: OwnerEID
OwnerEID.description: The EID of the data owner

SignAlgo.title: Signature Algorithm
SignAlgo.description: cryptographic scheme used to sign the certificate

Invoice.title: Invoice
Invoice.description: A statement of the money due for goods or services; a bill.

portOfEntry.title: Port Of Entry
portOfEntry.description: Port where the purchased goods will enter first.

purchaseDate.title: Purchase Date
purchaseDate.description: The date that payment is made.

destinationCountry.title: Destination Country
destinationCountry.description: Country to which the purchased product will be delivered

customer.title: Customer
customer.description: Party placing the order or paying the invoice.

provider.title: Provider
provider.description: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.

LEIaddress.title: LEIaddress
LEIaddress.description: GLEIF LEI Redord Level 1 Schema for LEI Address

LEIauthority.title: LEIauthority
LEIauthority.description: GLEIF LEI Redord Level 1 Schema for LEI Authority

LEIentity.title: LEIentity
LEIentity.description: GLEIF LEI Redord Level 1 Schema for LEI Entity

LEIregistration.title: LEIregistration
LEIregistration.description: GLEIF LEI Redord Level 1 Schema for LEI Registration

LegalEntityIdentifierCredential.title: LegalEntityIdentifierCredential
LegalEntityIdentifierCredential.description: GLEIF verifiable Legal Entity Identifier Credential (verifiable leiCode Credential)

leiCode.title: leiCode
leiCode.description: leiCode - An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442

certificateName.title: certificateName
certificateName.description: Specific name of issued legal entity certificate

LinkRole.title: Link Role
LinkRole.description: A Role that represents a Web link e.g. as expressed via the 'url' property.

target.title: Target
target.description: An entry point, within some Web-based protocol.

linkRelationship.title: Link Relationship
linkRelationship.description: Indicates the relationship type of a link.

MeterUniqueIdentifier.title: MeterUniqueIdentifier
MeterUniqueIdentifier.description: cryptographic scheme used to sign the certificate

RemoteDisconnectCapability.title: RemoteDisconnectCapability
RemoteDisconnectCapability.description: Reason why the AC was invoked

Organization.title: Organization
Organization.description: An organization such as a corporation, firm, club, etc.

globalLocationNumber.title: Global Location Number
globalLocationNumber.description: The GS1 GLN of the organization.

address.title: Postal Address
address.description: The postal address for an organization or place.

contactPoint.title: Contact Point
contactPoint.description: Points of contact for this organization

Place.title: Place
Place.description: Entities that have a somewhat fixed, physical location.

globalLocationNumber.title: Global Location Number (GLN)
globalLocationNumber.description: A Global Location Number (GLN) is the GS1 Identification Key used to identify physical locations or parties. The key comprises a GS1 Company Prefix, Location Reference and Check Digit. For more information, see http://www.gs1.org/gln.

geo.title: Geographic Coordinates
geo.description: Links to information about geocoordinates for a place.

address.title: Postal Address
address.description: The postal address for an organization or place.

PostalAddress.title: Postal Address
PostalAddress.description: The location at which a particular organization or person may be found or reached.

organizationName.title: Organization Name
organizationName.description: The name of the organization expressed in text.

streetAddress.title: Street Address
streetAddress.description: The street address expressed as free form text. The street address is printed on paper as the first lines below the name. For example, the name of the street and the number in the street or the name of a building.

addressLocality.title: Address Locality
addressLocality.description: Text specifying the name of the locality; for example, a city.

addressRegion.title: Address Region
addressRegion.description: Text specifying a province or state in abbreviated format; for example, NJ.

addressCountry.title: Address Country
addressCountry.description: Code specifying the country (and country subdivision) for the address using ISO 3166-1.

crossStreet.title: Cross Street
crossStreet.description: A street intersecting a main street (usually at right angles) and continuing on both sides of it.

countyCode.title: County Code
countyCode.description: A code that identifies a county. A county is a territorial division in some countries, forming the chief unit of local administration. In the US, a county is a political and administrative division of a state.

postalCode.title: Postal Code
postalCode.description: Text specifying the postal code for an address.

postOfficeBoxNumber.title: Post Office Box Number
postOfficeBoxNumber.description: The number that identifies a PO box. A PO box is a box in a post office or other postal service location assigned to an organization where postal items may be kept.

PriceSpecification.title: PriceSpecification
PriceSpecification.description: A structured value representing a price or price range.

price.title: Price
price.description: The offer price of a product, or of a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

priceCurrency.title: Price Currency
priceCurrency.description: The currency of the price, or a price component when attached to PriceSpecification and its subtypes.

PrivacyPolicy.title: PrivacyPolicy
PrivacyPolicy.description: Driver License user use to register

sizeOrAmount.title: Size or Amount
sizeOrAmount.description: The size or amount of the product

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: The quantity of the product contained by a package.

packagingType.title: Packaging Type
packagingType.description: Links to details about packaging material type, quantity and thickness

priceSpecification.title: Price Specification
priceSpecification.description: One or more detailed price specifications, indicating the unit price and delivery or payment charges.

sku.title: Sku Number
sku.description: The Stock Keeping Unit (SKU), i.e., a merchant-specific identifier for a product or service, or for the product to which the offer refers.

ProductRegistrationEvidenceDocument.title: Product Registration Evidence Document
ProductRegistrationEvidenceDocument.description: Evidence data for a registered eCommerce Product

category.title: A category for the product item.

inProductGroupWithID.title: Indicates the productGroupID for a ProductGroup
inProductGroupWithID.example: valid Product Group ID number per schema.org, could be NULL (required)

productID.title: Product ID
productID.example: Product number of registering Legal Entity such as an ISBN (required)

gtin.title: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN)
gtin.example: valid GTIN as number or URL per GS1 spec (required)

isAccessoryOrSparePartFor.title: Is accessory or sparepart for
isAccessoryOrSparePartFor.example: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is an accessory or spare part; may be empty (required)

releaseDate.title: Release date of a product or product model
releaseDate.example: date when product (version) was first released (required)

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer name or brand of the product

globalLocationNumber.title: Global Location Number (GLN)
globalLocationNumber.description: A Global Location Number of the manufacturer issued by GS1 (required), for more information see http://www.gs1.org/gln.

leiCode.title: Global Location Number (GLN)
leiCode.description: A Legal Entity Identifier of the manufacturer issued by GLEIF (required), for more information see https://gleif.org

model.title: Model of the product
model.example: produdct model name, a URL is also allowed (required)

material.title: Material the product is made from
material.example: Material the product is made from, could be specified as 'composites' (required)

weight.title: Weight of the product
weight.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measure (kg) (required)

height.title: Height of the product
height.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measure (meter) (required)

width.title: Width of the product
width.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measure (meter) (required)

depth.title: Depth of the Product
depth.example: floating point metric system value plus unit measure (meter) (required)

url.title: Url or the product item
url.example: URL of the product; could be empty (required)

isBasedOn.title: Is based on
isBasedOn.example: URI for the resource, e.g., patent, from which this work is derived or from which it is a modification or adaption; could be empty (required)

image.title: Image of the product
image.example: encoded picture of the product as a URI/URL (required)

customer.title: Customer
customer.description: The buying party of a purchase

invoice.title: Invoice
invoice.description: The invoice associated with a purchase

purchaseOrder.title: Purchase Order
purchaseOrder.description: The purchase order associated with a purchase

QuantitativeValue.title: Quantitative Value
QuantitativeValue.description: A point value or interval for product characteristics and other purposes

RevocationCertificate.title: RevocationCertificate
RevocationCertificate.description: Revocation Certificate as defined in VID I.

signature.title: Signature
signature.description: The signature for the certificate associated with the public key

RevocationList2020Status.title: RevocationList2020Status
RevocationList2020Status.description: Verifiable Credential credentialStatus Schema for RevocationList2020Status

ServiceProvider.title: ServiceProvider
ServiceProvider.description: EVGI: Common structure that wraps EID. ECs are extensible for addtional fileds

LegalName.title: Legal Name
LegalName.description: Legally registered name of the entity providing services

Address.title: Address
Address.description: Legally registered address of said legal entity

CarbonIntensity.title: CarbonIntensity
CarbonIntensity.description: cryptographic scheme used to sign the certificate

TotalCharge.title: TotalCharge
TotalCharge.description: TotalCharge definition based on IATA electronic Air Way Bill https://blanker.org/files/air-waybill-2.xls

TrustAnchor.title: Trust Anchor
TrustAnchor.description: EVGI: Human readable identifier for Trust Anchor

UniqueVehicleIdentifier.title: UniqueVehicleIdentifier
UniqueVehicleIdentifier.description: Unique Vehicle Identifier as defined in VID I.

User.title: User
User.description: EVGI: User Info. Must be distibuted through data host a d permission system.

PermissionedURI.title: Permissioned URI
PermissionedURI.description: The Permissioned URI is the URI of the Data Host where permissioned personal informaiton is stored

PermissionedEID.title: Permissioned EID
PermissionedEID.description: The Permissioned ID is the EID of the Data Host that is stroing premissioned perosnal info

UserEntityID.title: User Entity ID
UserEntityID.description: EVGI: EVGI Entity Extension includes metadata about payment parameters

Address.title: Address
Address.description: The address on this entity or user

VcSchemaForAccidentDamageAndTheftReports.title: VcSchemaForAccidentDamageAndTheftReports
VcSchemaForAccidentDamageAndTheftReports.description: Attributes necessary to construct verifiable credential for accident, damage, and theft reports

eventId.title: maintenanceType
eventId.description: Type of maintenance as defined in ISO 18542

insuranceClaimNumber.title: transactionID
insuranceClaimNumber.description: the number for the insurance claim

geolocation.title: geolocation
geolocation.description: the vehicle's location at time of accident

dateTime.title: dateTime
dateTime.description: the time and date of the accident/damage/event

jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.title: jurisdictionSpecificRequirement
jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.description: any metadata not captured by previous attributes

VcSchemaForEndOfLifeDocuments.title: VcSchemaForEndOfLifeDocuments
VcSchemaForEndOfLifeDocuments.description: Attributes necessary to construct verifiable credential for end of life documents

endOfLifeDispositionType.title: endOfLifeDispositionType
endOfLifeDispositionType.description: the type of end of life disposition

reason.title: reason
reason.description: reason for the vehicle's end of life

eventDateTime.title: eventDateTime
eventDateTime.description: date and time of the event associated with vehicle's end of life

prevOwnerId.title: chargeEndTime
prevOwnerId.description: the ID of the previous owner(s)

newOwnerId.title: newOwnerId
newOwnerId.description: the Id of the new owner(s)

titleNumber.title: titleNumber
titleNumber.description: the identifying number for the title

titleAuthority.title: titleAuthority
titleAuthority.description: the authority that issued that title

jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.title: jurisdictionSpecificRequirement
jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.description: any metadata not captured by previous attributes

VcSchemaForInspectionsReport.title: VcSchemaForInspectionsReport
VcSchemaForInspectionsReport.description: Attributes necessary to construct verifiable credential for inspections report

serviceProviderEntityId.title: serviceProviderEntityId
serviceProviderEntityId.description: the entity ID associated with the service provider

serviceProviderName.title: serviceProviderName
serviceProviderName.description: the name of the service provider

serviceInspectorId.title: serviceInspectorId
serviceInspectorId.description: the decentralized identifier (DID) associated with the service inspector

inspectionType.title: inspectionType
inspectionType.description: the type of inspection that took place

inspectionGeolocation.title: inspectionGeolocation
inspectionGeolocation.description: the geolocation where inspection took place

vehicleType.title: vehicleType
vehicleType.description: the type of vehicle being inspected

requestedAction.title: requestedAction
requestedAction.description: the requested action associated with the inspection

certExpDate.title: certExpDate
certExpDate.description: the expiry date for the certificate

jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.title: jurisdictionSpecificRequirement
jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.description: any metadata not captured by previous attributes

VcSchemaForInsuranceClaimsAndPolicies.title: VcSchemaForInsuranceClaimsAndPolicies
VcSchemaForInsuranceClaimsAndPolicies.description: Attributes necessary to construct verifiable credential for insurance claims and policies

financialAccount.title: financialAccount
financialAccount.description: the financial account or wallet information

insuranceClaimNumber.title: insuranceClaimNumber
insuranceClaimNumber.description: the identification number associated with the insurance claim

insuranceCompany.title: insuranceCompany
insuranceCompany.description: the name of the insurance company

insurancePolicyNumber.title: insurancePolicyNumber
insurancePolicyNumber.description: the identification number associated with the insurance policy

counterpartInsuranceCompany.title: counterpartInsuranceCompany
counterpartInsuranceCompany.description: name of the counterpart's insurance company

insuranceType.title: insuranceType
insuranceType.description: the type of insurance held by the driver

dateTime.title: dateTime
dateTime.description: the time and date of the accident/damage/event

geolocation.title: geolocation
geolocation.description: the vehicle's location at time of accident

otherParticipantInformation.title: otherParticipantInformation
otherParticipantInformation.description: the information, like EID, VID, or policy information associated with other participants

policeReportNumber.title: policeReportNumber
policeReportNumber.description: the number of the police report associated with accident

repairDurationInDays.title: repairDurationInDays
repairDurationInDays.description: the number of days required to complete the repair

repairFacilityId.title: repairFacilityId
repairFacilityId.description: the ID of the repair facility

fault.title: fault
fault.description: overview of the fault outcomes of the accident

jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.title: jurisdictionSpecificRequirement
jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.description: any metadata not captured by previous attributes

VcSchemaForMileage.title: VcSchemaForMileage
VcSchemaForMileage.description: Attributes necessary to construct verifiable credential for mileage

odometerReading.title: odometerReading
odometerReading.description: Type of maintenance as defined in ISO 18542

dateTime.title: dateTime
dateTime.description: the time and date of the accident/damage/event

technicalSource.title: technicalSource
technicalSource.description: the technical source of the information

jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.title: jurisdictionSpecificRequirement
jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.description: any metadata not captured by previous attributes

VcSchemaForOwnersTitlesAndBordersDocs.title: VcSchemaForOwnersTitlesAndBordersDocs
VcSchemaForOwnersTitlesAndBordersDocs.description: Attributes necessary to construct verifiable credential for Owners, Title, and Borders Documents

prevOwners.title: prevOwners
prevOwners.description: the previous owners of the vehicle

lenderId.title: lenderId
lenderId.description: the identifier for the lender who owns the lien

lienHolderName.title: lienHolderName
lienHolderName.description: the name of the lien holder

lienHolderAddress.title: lienHolderAddress
lienHolderAddress.description: the address of the lien holder

titleNumber.title: titleNumber
titleNumber.description: the identifying number for the title

city.title: city
city.description: the city associated with the title or other documentation

county.title: county
county.description: the county associated with the title or other documentation

state.title: state
state.description: the state associated with the title or other documentation

country.title: country
country.description: the country associated with the title or other documentation

odometerReading.title: odometerReading
odometerReading.description: the mileage as read from the vehicle's odometer

jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.title: jurisdictionSpecificRequirement
jurisdictionSpecificRequirement.description: any metadata not captured by previous attributes

dateTime.title: dateTime
dateTime.description: the time and date of the accident/damage/event

transactionContract.title: transactionContract
transactionContract.description: the contract associated with the transaction

newOwnerName.title: newOwnerName
newOwnerName.description: the name of the vehicle's new owner

lienExistence.title: lienExistence
lienExistence.description: an indicator field showing whether or not a lien on the vehicle exists

VcSchemaForPartsReplacementReport.title: VcSchemaForPartsReplacementReport
VcSchemaForPartsReplacementReport.description: Attributes necessary to construct verifiable credential for insurance claims and policies

dateTime.title: dateTime
dateTime.description: the time and date of the accident/damage/event

geolocation.title: geolocation
geolocation.description: the vehicle's location at time of accident

estimateNumber.title: estimateNumber
estimateNumber.description: the estimated cost of the repair

invoiceNumber.title: invoiceNumber
invoiceNumber.description: the financial account or wallet information

partType.title: partType
partType.description: the type of part involved in the replacement

oldPartNumber.title: oldPartNumber
oldPartNumber.description: the name of the insurance company

oldPartSerialNumber.title: oldPartSerialNumber
oldPartSerialNumber.description: the serial number associated with the old part

finalPartNumber.title: finalPartNumber
finalPartNumber.description: the part number of the new part.

finalPartSerialNumber.title: finalPartSerialNumber
finalPartSerialNumber.description: the serial number of the replacement part

finalPartManufacturer.title: finalPartManufacturer
finalPartManufacturer.description: the manufacturer of the new part

finalPartCondition.title: finalPartCondition
finalPartCondition.description: the condition of the new part installed into the vehicle

partRepairedOrReplaced.title: partRepairedOrReplaced
partRepairedOrReplaced.description: One of two strings: REPAIRED or REPLACED

aftermarketLikeNewPart.title: aftermarketLikeNewPart
